body:
### Before
```
$ spack versions cmake
==> Safe versions (already checksummed):
  3.7.1  3.6.1  3.6.0  3.5.2  3.5.1  3.5.0  3.4.3  3.4.0  3.3.1  3.1.0  3.0.2  2.8.10.2
==> Remote versions (not yet checksummed):
  3.4.2  3.4.1
```
```
$ spack checksum cmake
==> Found 4 versions of cmake:
  
  3.4.3  https://cmake.org/files/v3.4/cmake-3.4.3.tar.gz
  3.4.2  https://cmake.org/files/v3.4/cmake-3.4.2.tar.gz

How many would you like to checksum? (default is 1, q to abort)
```
### After

$ spack versions cmake
==> Safe versions (already checksummed):

  3.6.3  3.3.2  3.2.1  3.1.1  2.8.12.1  2.8.11    2.8.8  2.8.4  2.8.0  2.6.1  2.4.6  2.4.2  2.3.3-20060210  2.0.6
  3.6.2  3.3.0  3.2.0  3.0.1  2.8.12    2.8.10.1  2.8.7  2.8.3  2.6.4  2.6.0  2.4.5  2.4.1  2.3.2-20060209  1.8.3

title: Add list_url to cmake
